attributes.action: with immediate effect force all cyclists to register(for numberplates/identification plates),pay road tax,and get insurance, the same as all other uk road users.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As more and more cyclists are using britains roads, all cyclists should be made to tax,insure,and register their bicycles as all other uk road users are required to do, this will also make it easier to identify the reckless pavement riders,traffic light jumpers and other offenders who think the road traffic regulations do not apply to them!!!!!!
